name: Reklez - CD Bundle (Endangerment & Live and Tell)
description:
This is a GREAT chance to score TWO dope albums for CHEAP!!! Reklez "Endangerment" and "Live and Tell" both for $9.99!

FREE Live and Tell Poster (while they last)

name: Reklez - "Endangerment"
description:
Reklez is coming back with force on his new EP "Endangerment." Bringing along features by Krizz Kaliko, Jarren Benton, King Bishop BARS and Carl Roe, there is a track for everyones style. Kato, Diesel and Akt Aktion laced this album up with some bangin instrumentals that compliment Rek's raw gritty flow. 

Reklez
Ghost Worxx Records
May 1st, 2013

1. Endangerment
2. F***ed Up ft. Jarren Benton
3. Unpredictable ft. Krizz Kaliko
4. Too Dope ft. King Bishop BARS
5. Back On The Wall
6. Light It Up ft. Carl Roe
7. Silence

name: Reklez - "Live and Tell"
description:
The first full length album in the Reklez arsenal. Featuring the likes of DGAF's Gillies, Neema, Manic MC and more! 15 track list including 3 skits. This album hits a solid variety of styles of the hip-hop and rap genres such as hyphy, to lyrical, to gritty. This album is sure to keep you satisfied no matter what the mood. 

All orders get a FREE poster!

Reklez
Ghost Worxx Records
2011

1. Intro [Explicit]
2. Live and Tell [Explicit]
3. Talk Is Cheap Ft. Gillies of DGAF [Explicit]
4. Stay Free [Explicit]
5. Lyrical Soldiers Ft. Manic MC & Breeze [Explicit]
6. Real Talk (Skit) [Explicit]
7. Get Hyphy (Go Dumb) [Explicit]
8. Where You At Ft. Dl [Explicit]
9. Life I Was Given [Explicit]
10. Set It Off Ft. Big C [Explicit]]
11. The Northwest Ft. Neema [Explicit]
12. It Is What It Is (Skit) [Explicit]
13. Back Up On It [Explicit]
14. Bring The Noise Ft. Manic MC [Explicit]
15. One Way To Live Ft. Bobby James [Explicit]
